course.noContent: No content found in this course.

challenge.notFoundMessage: This challenge doesn't exist or has been removed. Try going back to the course and selecting a different challenge.
challenge.notAvailableInLanguage: This challenge is not available in this language.
challenge.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all files to their original state? All changes will be lost.
challenge.deleteFileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the file "{filename}"?
challenge.previewPlaceholder: Click the "Run Code" button to see the result
challenge.noTestFile: No test file found in challenge
challenge.solutionConfirm: This will overwrite your current files with the reference solution. Do you want to continue?
challenge.solutionNotAvailable: Solution is not available for this challenge.

database.blocked: Database is blocked by another tab. Please close all other tabs with this app and reload the page.
database.error:
Database connection error detected. This might be due to a corrupted database or multiple tabs being open simultaneously.

Would you like to reset the database? This will delete all stored data (progress, code) and reload the page.

Click OK to reset and reload, or Cancel to just reload and try again.
